member.name: P:DataManager.Players.PlayerDataJobListItem.Data1
member.summary: Item number if Mission Type is Item Retrieval. If Escort, pokemon number.

member.name: P:DataManager.Players.PlayerDataJobListItem.Data2
member.summary: Item amount if Mission Type is Item Retrieval.

member.name: M:DataManager.Players.PlayerDataManager.DeletePlayerRecruit(PMU.DatabaseConnector.MySql.MySql,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Will mark a recruit slot as deleted, allowing it to be overwritten. If inTempMode is true, the entry will be deleted instead.
member.param: if set to true, the temporary recruit will be deleted. Otherwise, the main recruit will be deleted.

member.name: M:DataManager.Players.PlayerFriendsList.AddFriend(PMU.DatabaseConnector.MySql.MySql,System.String)
member.summary:
Adds a new friend. Return codes are as follows:
0 - Success
1 - Friend is already on list

member.name: M:DataManager.Players.PlayerFriendsList.RemoveFriend(PMU.DatabaseConnector.MySql.MySql,System.String)
member.summary:
Removes a friend based on name. Return codes are as follows:
0 - Success
1 - Friend not found
